objects.description: Original variants of [BrainTest](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0009) "did have the ability to automatically root some devices, however, we did not observe that behavior in any of the 13 samples we recently discovered."

external_references.description: Chris Dehghanpoor. (2016, January 6). Brain Test re-emerges: 13 apps found in Google Play  Read more: Brain Test re-emerges: 13 apps found in Google Play. Retrieved December 21, 2016.
